sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using block matrices
message_1:
Consider the following system of linear equations:

\begin{align*}
x - 2y + 3z &= 1\\
2x + y + 5z &= 7\\
3x + 2y + 3z &= 4
\end{align*}

Write this system of linear equations using block matrices and then solve the system using block matrix operations. Determine the values of $x$, $y$, and $z$ that satisfy this system of equations.
